StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetReferral]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID INT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @SourceCode As VARCHAR(10)
--- GET THE RIGHT CONTRACT ID TO RETRIEVE REFERRAL DATA FOR IN CASE THE CONTRACT --- IS THE RESULT OF A COMPONENT CODE CHANGE SET @ContractID = dbo.GetReferralContractID(@ContractID)
SET @SourceCode = (SELECT N.SOURCE_CODE FROM NWA N INNER JOIN CONTRACT C ON N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID WHERE C.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID)
IF (SELECT REFERRAL_TYPE FROM REFERRAL WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID) = 'CDR' BEGIN --- CDR REFERRAL - THE REFERRER IS IN THE MARINE TABLE SELECT P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, SPACE(0) AS UNIT_NAME, CASE WHEN (@SourceCode = 'MCR') THEN RR.REFERRAL_RUC ELSE NULL END AS REFERRAL_RUC, CASE WHEN (@SourceCode = 'MCR') THEN RR.REFERRAL_RS ELSE NULL END AS REFERRAL_RS FROM REFERRAL R INNER JOIN PERSON P ON (R.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID AND R.MARINE_ID = P.PERSON_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN RESERVE_REFERRAL RR ON RR.REFERRAL_ID = R.REFERRAL_ID END ELSE BEGIN --- DEP REFERRAL - THE REFERRER IS IN THE CONTRACT TABLE SELECT P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, RO.NAME AS UNIT_NAME, CASE WHEN (@SourceCode = 'MCR') THEN RR.REFERRAL_RUC ELSE NULL END AS REFERRAL_RUC, CASE WHEN (@SourceCode = 'MCR') THEN RR.REFERRAL_RS ELSE NULL END AS REFERRAL_RS FROM REFERRAL R INNER JOIN CONTRACT C ON (R.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID AND R.DEP_CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RESERVE_REFERRAL RR ON RR.REFERRAL_ID = R.REFERRAL_ID END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
